intro: Gouania nematostachya, commonly known as the slender-stemmed gouania, is a flowering plant belonging to the Polygonaceae family. It is characterized by its upright, slender stems and small, clustered leaves. The plant produces tiny, greenish flowers that are typically arranged in inflorescences. It is native to Central and South America and thrives in moist, shaded environments. Gouania nematostachya is often found in humid forests and along stream banks.
